title: Web Development
introduction: Web development encompasses frontend, backend, and full-stack development. Learn to build modern, responsive, and scalable web applications.

topics.name: HTML5
topics.description: Semantic markup and modern HTML features

concepts.name: RESTful API Design
concepts.example:
GET /api/users - List all users
GET /api/users/:id - Get specific user
POST /api/users - Create new user
PUT /api/users/:id - Update user
DELETE /api/users/:id - Delete user

concepts.name: Responsive Design
